title: could i please play with someone from riot?
body: i'm not sure if you do this riot but could i please play with you. my dog recently died and i want my next match to be in her memory and that was why i was hoping to play with one of you. if you accept could it be on saturday or sunday and perhaps with skype. thanks

replies.body: How will playing with a Rioter help your dog?

> [{quoted}](name=Bipolar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RxTGUnOZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-28T06:03:44.618+0000)
>
> How will playing with a Rioter help your dog?

He said in memory, he didnt say it would help his dog. Fucking hell man.

> [{quoted}](name=astrapoof,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RxTGUnOZ,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-28T06:14:12.025+0000)
>
> oh shut up

Don't be rude, go play fetch with your dog or something.
That's as evil as Bane telling Batman to go cry to his mummy.

> [{quoted}](name=Bipolar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RxTGUnOZ,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-28T06:09:42.039+0000)
>
> Sorry I wasn't reading the thread, I do feel bad for laughing now, I didn't realize his dog is dead, but even then his dog is dead, it has no memory now, lol.

Also if he was trying to get the attention by using the dog he would of PUT IT IN THE FUCKING TITLE

> [{quoted}](name=Bipolar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RxTGUnOZ,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-28T06:09:42.039+0000)
>
> Sorry I wasn't reading the thread, I do feel bad for laughing now, I didn't realize his dog is dead, but even then his dog is dead, it has no memory now, lol.

In memory of is different to a dog having a memory, your a dick gtfo

> [{quoted}](name=ShuffledPancake,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RxTGUnOZ,comment-id=0000000000000001,timestamp=2015-05-28T06:15:41.478+0000)
>
> In memory of is different to a dog having a memory, your a dick gtfo

I fail to understand, it's an excuse to play with a Rioter and it seems sad if you ask me. I mean maybe if the dog played league and loved to play League and its dream was to play with a Rioter then maybe it would be a good idea, but I doubt that. I mean "my dog died, please Riot play with me in memory of my dog who has no memory of this game ever existing."

You see it as a dick move, but I see it as pathetic, take your choice, I also doubt a Rioter will add him on Skype as he would leak it, at most a Rioter would add him and play with him out of sympathy for this terrible excuse.

> [{quoted}](name=Bipolar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RxTGUnOZ,comment-id=00000000000000010000,timestamp=2015-05-28T06:26:21.522+0000)
>
> I fail to understand, it's an excuse to play with a Rioter and it seems sad if you ask me. I mean maybe if the dog played league and loved to play League and its dream was to play with a Rioter then maybe it would be a good idea, but I doubt that. I mean "my dog died, please Riot play with me in memory of my dog who has no memory of this game ever existing."
> 
> You see it as a dick move, but I see it as pathetic, take your choice, I also doubt a Rioter will add him on Skype as he would leak it, at most a Rioter would add him and play with him out of sympathy for this terrible excuse.

I was proving your statement wrong fuckboy, i wasnt approving that its right to do/say what he is saying/doing. Have some respect for the dead you cunt.
please shut up, you are nothing short of a monster for suggesting that. why would i take the death of one of my best friends as an excuse to play with a rioter? you disgust me

Change the word "dog" to "Nana" and you might get some traction.


Anyways, nice sentiment. I'm sure you're young, and a family pet dying is very sad.

Get another one = GG

wow the arguments.............
and sorry to hear your dog died
P.S: There's some pretty toxic people here
Sorry about your dog man... Hope you get your game :)
